choices.D: Manage Supply Chain Financial Orchestration Transfer Pricing Rules
choices.A: Configure Oracle Fusion Global Order Promising
choices.C: Manage Supply Execution Documentation Creation Rules
choices.E: Manage Supply Order Defaulting and Enrichment Rules

discussion.content:
D. Manage Supply Chain Financial Orchestration Transfer Pricing Rules

https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/supply-chain-management/r13-update17d/faims/implementing-internal-material-transfers.html#FAIMS1917912

questions.question_text:
You want to perform Internal Material Transfer across Business Units and want to capture internal margin as part of revenue for the selling Business Unit.
Which mandatory task would you perform for this requirement?

The orchestration process fulfillment task is performed by an external system and you need to register the connector to integrate the non-Fusion system.
Which two steps would you perform to invoke the external connector service endpoint URL? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Solution seems to be correct - AD

90% confident

choices.A: Create a new web service connector to register the endpoint URL.
choices.C: Create a new routing rule for the fulfilment task to call the endpoint URL.
choices.D: Create a new routing rule for the fulfilment task to call the connector.
choices.B: Create a new fulfilment task service to register the endpoint URL.

choices.D: Release and deploy the orchestration process.

questions.question_text: Which action must be performed on the orchestration process user interface to activate an orchestration process after the order orchestration configurations are completed?

discussion.content:
D. Release and deploy the orchestration process.

https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/supply-chain-management/20a/faiom/orchestrate-fulfillment.html#FAIOM3365975
Release and deploy an orchestration process that you create so its available throughout Order Management. 

If you use one of these predefined orchestration processes, then you must deploy it, but its not necessary to release it:
1. ShipOrderGenericProcess
2. ReturnOrderGenericProcess

Summary of the Steps:
1. Release the orchestration process.
2. Deploy the orchestration process.

questions.answer_description:
Explanation -
An orchestration process routes and manages sales orders across multiple fulfillment systems. For example, you can use a schedule, ship, and bill process to route order lines to two different enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems.

Reference -
https://docs.oracle.com/cloud/farel11/scmcs_gs/FAIOM/FAIOM1726751.htm
questions.question_text: How does Order Management interact with multiple fulfillment systems to fulfill sales order lines?

choices.D: The sales order lines are converted to Fulfillment Lines and fed to the Fulfillment systems.
choices.C: The Fulfillment system routing is defined in the orchestration.
choices.A: It has a web service broker that routes requests from the Fulfillment Task Layer.
choices.B: It has a web service broker that routes requests from the External Interface Layer.

discussion.content: B is the correct answer It has a web service broker that routes requests from the External Interface Layer.
Not sure - B is most likely correct (A is the only other relevant answer).

questions.question_text: What is the configuration required to automatically calculate the Jeopardy Score and priority when an orchestration process is planned or re-planned?

choices.B: Check the change mode parameter to Advanced on the orchestration process.
choices.A: Schedule the process refresh and start the order promising server.
choices.C: Schedule the process plan orchestration processes.
choices.D: Check the Replan Instantly parameter in the orchestration process.

discussion.content:
0% Confidence (D possibly). This question may no longer be valid in 2020 exams. Only information found was:

https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/supply-chain-management/20a/faiom/set-up-order-processing.html#FAIOM1766528
Set Up Jeopardy and Lead Time to Manage Delay
To manage delay, set up jeopardy priority, lead time, and jeopardy threshold for your orchestration process.

Summary of the Steps:
Manage jeopardy priority.
Specify lead time.
Manage jeopardy threshold.

This topic describes how to do these steps because you often do them together. However, you can do them independently of one another.
